metadata.Plot: Maggie, a headlining comedienne with the Follies, takes a fall off the stage into the orchestra pit and lands on the drum of musician Al Cassidy. One thing leads to another, they fall in love and get married. Al becomes a famous songwriter and Maggie stays home and has children. One day Al is hired to write a big number for Selma Larson, one of the Follies' most beautiful stars, and falls for her. Complications ensue.
metadata.Writer: Adela Rogers St. Johns, Alice D.G. Miller, Joseph Farnham
metadata.Actors: Zasu Pitts, Tom Moore, Ann Pennington
